name: Earth Power
description: You cause the ground beneath a creature to erupt with power. Make a ranged attack, dealing 2d8 + MOVE ground damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 19 or 20, the next attack against the target is rolled at advantage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
